question.pageTitle: Part I: Determining Strategies and Response Plan
question.questionText: As you're about to enter the hot zone for the first time, you need to consider which sampling equipment or methods you will use, based on the information you already have. Match each statement with the equipment or method to which it applies in this situation.
question.instructionText: Select the appropriate answers, then click Done.
